dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3540 IH: Low-Income Housing Tax Credit Elimination Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grothman (for himself and Mr. Gosar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to sunset the low-income housing tax credit, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Low-Income Housing Tax Credit Elimination Act.

section.header: Sunset of low-income housing tax credit
section.text: Section 42 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: No credit shall be determined under subsection (a) with respect to any building placed in service in a taxable year beginning after the date of the enactment of this subsection.
